Content:: A Boy and a Girl (Russian: Мальчик и девочка, romanized: Malchik i devochka) is a 1966 Soviet drama film directed by Yuliy Fayt.[1][2][3] The boy meets the girl on the seashore and love arose between them. But soon the boy left, and the girl gave birth to a child.[4] This article related to Russian film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: A Boy and a Girl (1966 film) - Wikipedia
